response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am pleased to extend a special offer to you. For a limited time only, you can secure this remarkable item for $950,000. This represents an exceptional saving compared to its full value and is a unique chance to own something truly exceptional. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
